Detailed Description

Treecombine combines track segments and performs line fitting.

Combines track segments and performs line fitting.

treecombine performs many of the tasks involved with matching hits to track segments and combining track segments into full tracks with lab coordinates.

Author:
Burnham Stokes
Date:
7/30/08
Treecombine performs many of the tasks involved with matching hits to track segments and combining track segments into full tracks with lab coordinates.

Note:
The number of hits should be passed correctly. The next line used to be 2 * tlayer (for no obvious reason) and was ad-hoc changed to twice that.
Todo:
Need to revisit whether tlayer needs to be passed and used as the length of the array hits.
